snippet.title: ONE PIECE ODYSSEY — Water Seven Trailer
snippet.description:
Revisit the oceanic metropolis of Water Seven as old friends reunite to help Luffy rescue his captured crewmates from the claws of CP9’s Rob Lucci!

ONE PIECE ODYSSEY drops anchor January 13th, 2023.

Pre-order today: http://spr.ly/6052MQJSI 

#ONEPIECEODYSSEY #ONEPIECE #Water7
Follow One Piece Games: http://spr.ly/6053MQJSL

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment America:
Instagram: http://spr.ly/6054MQJS0
Facebook: http://spr.ly/6055MQJSF
Twitter: http://spr.ly/6056MQJS2
Twitch: http://spr.ly/6057MQJSN
